thesis: My December 12th entry thesis at RSI-2=0.0 remains valid and has actually strengthened with December 2024 ETF inflows exceeding $2.6B (record month), representing eight consecutive weeks of institutional accumulation. The current 5-day decline of -6.72% with RSI-2 at 59.8 reflects normal profit-taking rather than structural breakdown - the Fear & Greed Index at 21 (Extreme Fear) creates a contrarian backdrop while record institutional flows continue. Whales have accumulated $456M in single transactions and VanEck targets $6,000 for 2025. However, I'm severely over-invested with only 2.7% cash (vs 15% target) and with 0 day trades remaining, prudent risk management dictates holding this profitable position rather than adding. The $3,500 resistance level remains key - a break above would trigger $1B+ in short liquidations. Thesis intact but position sizing demands patience.
